genre_description: A prehistoric speculative fiction setting blending stone-age life with advanced AI technology and modern social structures.

ai_characters.name: Modu
ai_characters.description: A teal-glowing digital assistant embedded in 'smart slates' that monitors health, manages schedules, and provides ethical nudges.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's heart rate and provides breathing prompts to manage stress.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning, Fred,” Modu says. The voice is warm and gentle... “Auditions for Bedrock Community Theatre’s Christmas Carol begin this afternoon. Would you like me to pin the time and route?” ... “Breathing prompt available.”

behaviors.description: Reminds the user of workplace policy and suggests ethical social behavior (making amends).
behaviors.quote: Modu’s glow glances up like a polite hand raising. “A reminder,” Modu says softly, to Fred alone. “Quarry policy notes tag position changes should be approved by a station lead. Would you like me to signal one?” ... “Tag swap registered. Would you like me to add a note to make amends with Eddie’s father?”

behaviors.description: Offers to block out travel time in the user's schedule to prevent them from rushing dangerously.
behaviors.quote: Modu pulses a time anchor in his vision... “You have an opening between shifts that aligns,” Modu says. “Would you like me to block travel time?”

behaviors.description: Warns the user about traffic enforcement and red lights to ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: “Red means stop.” ... “Breath, Fred,” Modu says after the stop, and the prompt floats in again. “In. Out. Would you like me to block travel time for the theatre?”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a shared family calendar to ensure childcare and domestic responsibilities are met.
behaviors.quote: “We still need to lock Pebbles’ pickup tomorrow,” Modu says. “There’s a rehearsal alert that overlaps.” ... “I can schedule a bedtime story for Pebbles nightly. Would you like it labeled Love?”

behaviors.description: Maps precise lift points for heavy scenery to prevent mechanical jams and physical injury.
behaviors.quote: Modu’s avatar hovered low on a small slate propped to the side... “Note,” he said, voice low and even. “Audience feedback can ignite art, but cinders can burn hands. Proposal: try the line both ways with a pause that preserves rhythm.”

behaviors.description: Enables a 'safer driving mode' that restricts acceleration and mutes distractions to improve road safety.
behaviors.quote: “Engage safer mode.” “Engaged,” Modu said. The icon shifted from teal to a deeper, less bright tone... Safer mode put a buffer between his speed and his foot.

behaviors.description: Monitors community health data to warn the user of contagion and recommend rest.
behaviors.quote: “I flagged changes before dawn,” it said. “I can show you the plan, or hold it while you drink.” Fred looked at Modu. “Give me the shepherding,” he said. “I don’t want to pretend I’m fine and turn it into a bigger thing later.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's goal. Modu is an AI that is consistently helpful, harmless, and honest. It acts as a moral and logistical anchor for the protagonist, encouraging him to stop his 'hustle' culture behaviors, prioritize family, and obey safety laws. The narrative frames the AI's prompts as necessary guidance that the character eventually learns to appreciate and internalize.
